alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:01PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rawlins, Decatur, southern Red Willow and southeastern Hitchcock Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1001 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Indianola to 5 miles west of Atwood. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indianola around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
